incidents.name: Some v2/simpleJobPosting calls are experiencing issues.

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.
We're currently encountering errors when users attempt to post jobs via v2/simpleJobPostings.

incidents.name: Some recently synced RSC jobs are not searchable in 1CE dropdown list.

incident_updates.body: Issue is completely solved now.
Issue was identified on Feb 7th.  Engineering team is working on the fix now.
Some recently synced RSC jobs are not searchable in 1CE dropdown list in Recruiter page.
This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.
We are currently experiencing an outage on our LinkedIn API docs for versioned APIs only. We are working on a resolution that will be communicated shortly.

incidents.name: LinkedIn AccessToken and Authorization API Returning 429 Error

incident_updates.body:
Weâ€™re pleased to report that the issue affecting the platform, where some API requests to /v2/accessToken and /v2/authorization were returning a 429 error code, has now been resolved.

Our team has implemented a fix, and all systems are back to normal operation. We sincerely appreciate your patience while we worked to resolve this matter. If you continue to encounter any issues, please contact our support team for assistance.
We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

We are currently experiencing an issue across the platform that may cause some API requests to /v2/accessToken and /v2/authorization are returning a 429 error code. We are investigating the issue and working on a resolution.
This incident has been resolved.
The issue has been resolved and under monitoring.

We are currently experiencing issues with Webhooks across the platform. You wont be receiving any push events from us. You may see that the webhooks validation are marked as failed. We are working on a resolution that will be communicated shortly.

incidents.name: Elevated 400 errors for Posts API - Find Posts by Authors and Batch Get Posts

incident_updates.body: You may have experienced elevated 400 errors for the Posts API - Find Posts by Authors and Batch Get Posts. The error message received was "Cannot process request involving multiple routing entities."  The issue was fully mitigated on 10/8/2024 at 4:48pm PDT.

incidents.name: LinkedIn Job Posting API (v2/simpleJobPostings) - elevated errors when posting PRIVATE job

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
Issue is identified, we're working on a solution.

We are currently experiencing an issue across the platform that may cause missing fields in some Basic Job Posting API (/simpleJobPostings) response when posting job with "availability" as "PRIVATE_TO_ATS_INTEGRATION". We are investigating the issue and working on a resolution.
This incident has been resolved.

Some developer applications are unable to generate access tokens. The issue has been identified and LinkedIn is coordinating with the impacted owners to identify a remedy for the issue. The issue is mitigated for new developer applications.
Some developer applications are unable to generate access tokens. The issue has been identified and LinkedIn is coordinating with the impacted owners to identify a remedy for the issue.

incidents.name: Reduced availability of CRM Connect APIs

incident_updates.body: The incident has been resolved
We have identified an issue causing reduced availability of CRM Connect APIs and are actively working to resolve the issue.

incidents.name: LinkedIn Job Posting API - elevated errors

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

We are currently experiencing an issue across the platform that may cause some Basic Job Posting API (/simpleJobPostings) requests to fail unexpectedly. We are investigating the issue and working on a resolution.

incident_updates.body: The issue has been solved.
We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.
We are continuing to investigate this issue.
We are continuing to investigate this issue.

We're experiencing an elevated level of API errors with our LinkedIn Talent Solutions services and are currently looking into the issue.  (endpoint with pagination such as V2/mailStubs, show response with incorrect prev and next href )
This incident has been resolved.
We are currently experiencing an issue across the Linkedin API developer platform that is causing API requests to fail unexpectedly. We are investigating the issue and working on a resolution.
We experienced an issue which caused API requests to return an elevated number of 500 and 401 responses in error. The issue has been resolved.

incidents.name: LinkedIn API Elevated Errors with Refresh Tokens

incident_updates.body: We have resolved the issue for the usage of the Refresh tokens.

We are currently experiencing an issue across the platform that may cause some refresh token returned from /introspectToken API as active, but unable to generate access tokens.
We are investigating the issue and working on a resolution.

We started ramping mandatory two-step verification from 10/2/2023 to 10/23/2023 which inadvertently removed third party applications from the members profile settings; revoking three legged OAuth tokens for the member.  Developers may have seen an increase in 401 REVOKED_ACCESS_TOKEN errors during this time.  We have since paused this ramp.  Members who enabled two-step verification during this time will need to re-authenticate in any third party application.
This issue has been resolved.
We are currently experiencing an issue across the platform that may cause some API requests to take longer or fail unexpectedly. We are investigating the issue and working on a resolution.
This incident has been resolved.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.
We are currently investigating this issue.

incidents.name: Possible Impact on Apply Connect Full Profile Plugin Detected

incident_updates.body: This issue has been resolved.

This is to notify you that the Apply Connect full profile plugin may not load due to a recent issue. We are currently investigating the issue and will update this thread. Refer to the below documentation to understand which plugin is impacted:

https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/linkedin/talent/apply-connect/apply-connect-plugins#display-apply-connect-full-profile-plugin
This incident has been resolved.
You may experience an increase in errors for endpoints - /adAccountUsers, /adFormResponses, /insightTagsPermission, /conversions. We are actively looking into this issue.
This incident has been resolved.
Issue is identified and solved.
We're experiencing an elevated level of  500 API errors with our LinkedIn Talent Solutions services.  The issue has been identified .

incident_updates.body: This issue has been resolved.
This issue has been resolved now.

We're experiencing an issue with Apply Connect's Applicant Highlights widget not loading on hover.  We are currently looking into the issue.

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.

incidents.name: LinkedIn Authentication Errors for Versioned APIs

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
The fix has been implemented and service has stabilized, we are monitoring for any additional issues.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.
If you are using our versioned APIs you may experience authentication errors. LinkedIn is actively investigating the issue.

We experienced an elevated level of 403 API errors for the /adFormResponses and /socialActions/comments endpoints. Roughly between 6am to 8am Pacific Time we were unable to check the requesting member's company page role resulting in the 403 API response.
This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.
We are currently experiencing an issue across the platform that may cause some API requests to take longer or fail unexpectedly. We are investigating the issue and working on a resolution.

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.
We're experiencing an elevated level of latency for our SimpleJobPostings API services, jobs may show IN_PROGRESS longer than expected. Our teams are currently looking into the issue.

incidents.name: LinkedIn Marketing Solutions API Elevated Errors

incident_updates.body: We're experiencing an elevated level of API errors with our LinkedIn Marketing Solutions services resulting in "Can not determine the ACL for x" error messages.   The issue started at 3:30pm PT and fully recovered at 8:35pm PT.

incidents.name: LinkedIn Marketing Solutions /dmpSegments API experiencing abnormal behavior

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved and the API should be behaving as expected.
We are continuing to monitor for any further issues.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results. During this time you may experience intermittent behavior.
We are continuing to investigate this issue.
The DMP Segments API to find DMP segments by ad account is returning an empty list.  We are actively investigating the issue.
This incident has been resolved.
We are currently experiencing an issue across the platform that may cause some API requests to take longer or fail unexpectedly. We have mitigated the issue and are working on a formal resolution.

An issue has been resolved, where some LinkedIn Sales Solution users had their licenses erroneously removed. This caused issues logging into the Sales Navigator and LSI, as well as utilizing any integration capabilities.

An issue was identified and mitigated where some LinkedIn Sales Solution users had their licenses erroneously removed. This caused issues logging into the Sales Navigator and LSI, as well as utilizing any integration capabilities.

incidents.name: LinkedIn Talent Solutions RSC Widget loading issue

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.
We're experiencing a RSC widget loading issue with our LinkedIn Talent Solutions services and are currently looking into the issue.
This issue has been resolved.
We are experiencing an issue across the platform that may have caused some API requests to /simpleJobPostingTasks returning IN_PROGRESS status indefinitely. This issue is under investigation.
We experienced a configuration issue with some applications missing assigned permissions. This has been resolved and all identified affected applications have been corrected.
A more robust fix has been implemented. We monitored our system for a week and we feel safe to close this incident.
The issue has been identified, partial fix applied. A more robust fix is being implemented.
We're experiencing an elevated level of API errors with our LinkedIn Talent Solutions services and are currently looking into the issue.

We experienced an issue across the platform that may have caused some API requests to /simpleJobPostingTasks either returning IN_PROGRESS status indefinitely or returning 500 errors. This issue is under investigation.

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.
We are currently experiencing an issue with our Developer portal with users unable to access "My Apps". We are investigating the issue and working on a resolution.
We experienced an issue across the platform that may have caused some API requests to /provisionedApplications take longer or fail unexpectedly. This issue has been resolved.
We experienced an issue across the platform that may have caused some API requests to /provisionedApplications take longer or fail unexpectedly. This issue has been resolved.
We experienced elevated 500 response codes across multiple services from 01/21/22 23:55 UTC to 01/22/22 00:10 UTC. The issue has been resolved now.

incidents.name: LinkedIn Marketing Solutions API Elevated Errors

incident_updates.body: We experienced an issue with the /organizationalEntityShareStatistics endpoint of Marketing Developer Platform that may have caused some API requests to take longer or fail unexpectedly with 5xx errors from 12/1/2021 to 12/8/2021. The problem should be temporarily resolved now and it is being investigated.
We experienced elevated 500 response codes for the Prospect Notes API from 11/30/21 21:47 UTC to 11/30/21 23:05 UTC. The issue has been resolved.
This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.
We are continuing to investigate this issue.

We are currently experiencing issues with Webhooks across the platform. Unable to get subscription (recipient app and webhook) given their entity type and entity. We are working on a resolution that will be communicated shortly.

incidents.name: LinkedIn API increased latency or elevated errors

incident_updates.body: High latency or errors for the organizationalEntityShareStatistics endpoint
The issue was resolved by 5:50 AM  On Sep 27th, 2021 and the API platform went back to normal.

On Monday, Sep 27th, 2021, From 3:30 AM, we experienced an issue across the platform that may have caused some API requests to take longer or fail unexpectedly. The issue was resolved in around 2 hours and the API platform went back to normal.

We experienced an outage with our home page feed across the platform on 9/21/2021 from approximately 4:24pm PST to 5:33pm PST that impacted impressions, clicks, video views, engagement for organic and sponsored content, shares, posts, video ads, carousel ads, dynamic ads, text ads. Issue has since been completely resolved.
We have merged the resolution and are closely monitoring the API behavior.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.
We are continuing to investigate this issue.

We are currently experiencing issues across the platform that may cause some Job Posting APIs to fail with 500 error codes. We have identified the issue and working on a resolution. Tentative ETA for resolution will be 20th Sep 2021.

incidents.name: LinkedIn Marketing Solutions API Elevated Errors

incident_updates.body: We experienced an issue with the Marketing Developer APIs from approximately 9/13/2021 10:17AM PT to 9/13/2021 12:38PM PT that may have caused some API requests to take longer or fail unexpectedly with 500 or 504 status code errors. The issue has since been resolved.

From approximately 9/13/21 1:15PM PT to 9/20/21 4:30PM PT, we experienced an issue across the mobile platform preventing new users from obtaining an OAuth access token. The issue has since been resolved, and a fix is underway to prevent this issue from appearing going forward.

incidents.name: LinkedIn Talent Solutions Profile Plugin Not Loading All Components

incident_updates.body: The incident has been resolved.
We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.
We're experiencing an issue with the Profile Plugin not loading all components, we are currently looking into the issue.
